org.openbase.bco.dal.lib.layer.unit

Interface Unit<D>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - the data type of this unit used for the state synchronization.
    All Superinterfaces:
    org.openbase.jul.iface.provider.ConfigProvider<rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Configurable<String,rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>, org.openbase.jul.pattern.provider.DataProvider<D>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Identifiable<String>, org.openbase.jul.iface.provider.LabelProvider, org.openbase.jul.extension.rst.iface.ScopeProvider, Service, ServiceProvider, org.openbase.jul.iface.Snapshotable<rst.domotic.action.SnapshotType.Snapshot>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Agent, App, AuthorizationGroup, BaseUnit<DATA>, BaseUnitController<D,DB>, Connection, Device, Location, Scene, UnitController<D,DB>, UnitGroup, UnitHost<D>, UnitRemote<M>, UnitRemote<M>, User
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBaseUnitController, AbstractDALUnitController, AbstractExecutableBaseUnitController, AbstractHostUnitController, AbstractUnitController, AbstractUnitRemote, AgentRemote, AppRemote, AudioSourceController, AudioSourceRemote, AuthorizationGroupRemote, BatteryController, BatteryRemote, BrightnessSensorController, BrightnessSensorRemote, ButtonController, ButtonRemote, ColorableLightController, ColorableLightRemote, ConnectionRemote, DeviceRemote, DimmableLightController, DimmableLightRemote, DimmerController, DimmerRemote, HandleController, HandleRemote, LightController, LightRemote, LightSensorController, LightSensorRemote, LocationRemote, MonitorController, MonitorRemote, MotionDetectorController, MotionDetectorRemote, PowerConsumptionSensorController, PowerConsumptionSensorRemote, PowerSwitchController, PowerSwitchRemote, ReedContactController, ReedContactRemote, RollerShutterController, RollerShutterRemote, SceneRemote, SmokeDetectorController, SmokeDetectorRemote, SwitchRemote, TamperDetectorController, TamperDetectorRemote, TemperatureControllerController, TemperatureControllerRemote, TemperatureSensorController, TemperatureSensorRemote, UnitGroupRemote, UserRemote, VideoDepthSourceController, VideoDepthSourceRemote, VideoRgbSourceController, VideoRgbSourceRemote

    public interface Unit<D>
extends org.openbase.jul.iface.provider.LabelProvider, org.openbase.jul.extension.rst.iface.ScopeProvider, org.openbase.jul.iface.Identifiable<String>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Configurable<String,rst.domotic.unit.UnitConfigType.UnitConfig>, org.openbase.jul.pattern.provider.DataProvider<D>, ServiceProvider, Service, org.openbase.jul.iface.Snapshotable<rst.domotic.action.SnapshotType.Snapshot>
    Author:
    Divine Threepwood

      • getUnitShape

        default rst.spatial.ShapeType.Shape getUnitShape()
                                          throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method returns the unit shape of this unit.

        If this unit configuration does not provide any shape information the shape of the unit host will be returned. In case the unit host even does not provide any shape information and the unit is a device than the shape of the device class will be used.

        Returns:
        the shape representing the unit.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown if the unit shape is not available or the resolution has been failed.

        default javax.media.j3d.Transform3D getTransform3D()
                                            throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                                                   InterruptedException
        Deprecated. please use getRootToUnitTransform3D() instead.
        Gets the Transform3D of the transformation from root to unit coordinate system.

        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown if the transformation is not available.

      • getTransform3DInverse

        @Deprecated
default javax.media.j3d.Transform3D getTransform3DInverse()
                                                               throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException,
                                                                      InterruptedException
        Deprecated. please use getUnitToRootTransform3D() instead.
        Gets the inverse Transform3D to getTransform3D(). This is basically rotation and translation of the object in the root coordinate system and thereby the inverse transformation to the one returned by getTransform3D().
        Returns:
        transform relative to root location
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown if the transformation is not available.
        InterruptedException - is thrown if the thread was externally interrupted.

      • getUnitToRootTransform3D

        default javax.media.j3d.Transform3D getUnitToRootTransform3D()
                                                      throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Gets the transformation leading from the unit to the root location. This is basically rotation and translation of the object in the root coordinate system and thereby the inverse transformation to the one returned by getTransform3D().
        Returns:
        transform relative to root location
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown if the transformation is not available.

        Remove an observer which is only notified if the desired service type for the desired service tempus changes.
        Parameters:
        serviceTempus - The service tempus on which the observer is removed.
        serviceType - The service type on which the observer is removed.
        observer - The observer which is removed.

      • addDataObserver

        void addDataObserver(rst.domotic.service.ServiceTempusTypeType.ServiceTempusType.ServiceTempus serviceTempus,
                     org.openbase.jul.pattern.Observer<D> observer)
        Add a data observer which is only notified if data for the given service tempus changes. The value unknown is equivalent to listening on all changes.
        Parameters:
        serviceTempus - The service tempus on which the observer is added.
        observer - The observer which is added.

      • removeDataObserver

        void removeDataObserver(rst.domotic.service.ServiceTempusTypeType.ServiceTempusType.ServiceTempus serviceTempus,
                        org.openbase.jul.pattern.Observer<D> observer)
        Remove a data observer which is only notified if data for the given service tempus changes. The value unknown is equivalent to listening on all changes.
        Parameters:
        serviceTempus - The service tempus on which the observer is removed.
        observer - The observer which is removed.
